price: They say, “We will never believe in you until you cause a spring to gush forth for us from the earth[80],
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَن نُّؤۡمِنَ لَكَ حَتَّىٰ تَفۡجُرَ لَنَا مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَنۢبُوعًا
footnotes: [80] Showing miracles are of no use, even if it is catastrophic to them.
